text: Hey guys, its there a way to display a repeater field in and specific order? Date added for example without having to drag the order around?
Yep and my accessibility testing tools do not like it. :pensive:
Yes Iâ€™ve added a `callback` parameter that allows you to format using a JS function: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/tags#blog-related-posts>

yes, you can use the sort filter on your for statement

`{% for item in module.group|sort(false, false, 'date_field_to_sort' %}` 
    `{{ item }}`
`{% endfor %}`

the first 'false' is reverse order, the second 'false' is case sensitive', the third value is the property to sort on
